author: damjan
msg: Deal with TIFF files with FillOrder=2.

author: damjan
msg: rowsPerStrip is meant to be a 32 bit unsigned integer,
since we store it in an int, and real-world TIFF
files use the value 2^32 - 1, it needs to be
promoted to a long when calculating tile height

author: ramkrishna
msg: Moved HBASE-5137 fixed version from 0.90.5 to 0.90.6.
